sources.title: The Monster of Piedras Blancas
sources.description: Title: The Monster of Piedras Blancas Summary: The monster, which looks like a snarling "Creature from the Black Lagoon," invades a sleepy seaside town. The lighthouse keeper, newly widowed and estranged from the town folk, has been ... Directed by: Irvin Berwick Actors: Les Tremayne, Forrest Lewis, John Harmon Production Company: Vanwick Productions Release Date: 14 September 1959 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.85 : 1 The monster, which looks like a snarling "Creature from the Black Lagoon," invades a sleepy seaside town. The lighthouse keeper, newly widowed and estranged from the town folk, has been leaving food out for the monster for years, unaware of it's blood lust. When the monster's appetite outstrips the keeper's ability to serve it, bloodless decapitated corpses start to show up.

sources.title: The Monster of Piedras Blancas (1959)
sources.description: The Monster of Piedras Blancas is a 1959 American horror film directed by Irvin Berwick. The story is set in a small California town where a lighthouse keeper, Sturges, is worried about his daughter and the safety of the community. He believes a sea monster, which he has been feeding, is responsible for a series of gruesome murders. As bodies begin to wash ashore, a local scientist identifies a scale from the creature, leading to a confrontation with the monster.

sources.title: The Monster of Piedras Blancas (1959) Colorized | Horror, Sci-Fi Cult Classic Movie
sources.description:
MAN-MONSTER FROM THE SLIMY DEATHS! HE PREYS ON HUMAN FLESH!
An old lighthouse keeper who lives with his daughter secretly keeps a prehistoric fish-man by feeding it scraps and fish. 

Director: Irvin Berwick
Writer: H. Haile Chace
Stars: Les Tremayne, Forrest Lewis, John Harmon
Genre:  Classics, Cult Movies, Horror, Science Fiction & Fantasy

Watch the original Black & White version: https://youtu.be/SYKl4PtdPUA

sources.title: The Monster of Piedras Blancas (1959) Cult Classic Horror, Sci-Fi Movie | Full Film | Subtitles
sources.description:
An old lighthouse keeper who lives with his daughter secretly keeps a prehistoric fish-man by feeding it scraps and fish. One day he misses the feeding and all hell breaks loose.

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/C8Li3E-Qo84 
Director: Irvin Berwick
Writer: H. Haile Chace
Stars: Les Tremayne, Forrest Lewis, John Harmon
Genre:  Classics, Cult Movies, Horror, Science Fiction & Fantasy

metadata.Plot: The monster, which looks like a snarling "Creature from the Black Lagoon," invades a sleepy seaside town. The lighthouse keeper, widowed and estranged from the town folk, has been secretly leaving food out for the monster for years, unaware of its blood lust. When the monster's appetite outstrips the keeper's ability to serve it, bloodless decapitated corpses start to show up.
